title: lo mon no mani che mi accarezzino il volto (There are No Hands to Caress My Face)
marks: Signature and Stamp on back, in black ink: [Mario Giacometti]
description: seven men dressed as clergymen wearing long dark coats, ecclesiastical white collars and dark hats; central man seated in chair, removing his hat; all other men stand except crouching man in LLC; white ground
